examples.example: 新的工作模式让我们的效率有了极大提升。

translate.english: The new working model has greatly improved our efficiency.

examples.example: 这种创新的模式为我们打开了全新的发展局面。

translate.english: This innovative model has opened up a brand new development situation for us.

examples.example: 这种高效的模式帮助我们更快地完成任务，取得了良好的成果。

translate.english: This efficient model helps us complete the task more quickly and has achieved good results.
